dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5609 IH: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for security protection for the former Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases who served between January 1984 and December 2022.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Strong (for himself, Mr. Rogers of Alabama, Mr. Collins, and Mr. Moore of Alabama) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for security protection for the former Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases who served between January 1984 and December 2022.

section.header: No Federal funds for security protection for the former Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases who served between January 1984 and December 2022
section.text: No Federal funds may be used for U.S. Marshal protection, or any other security protection, for the former Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases who served between January 1984 and December 2022.
